languages.text: Reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

traits.locale_text: Réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} de la cible de -5 pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Cumulable 3 fois.
